entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 07:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -41.8°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 56 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
